title: Region change bug patch 7.20
body: I just purchased 35euros of worth rp to change my region from EUW-EUNE, since i open account and shop the only option i see is "Summoner name change" where is the region change options?{{champion:157}}

replies.body:
Just to provide a bit more context on Seras' comment, 

> Account transfers will be temporarily unavailable from October 10th until November 20th.

http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown

Region transfers are disabled until a little after the ranked season ends. As far as I know they do this so people don't lose their rank rewards so close to the end of season and to keep distribution simple.
